archimate:BusinessObject.name: Auditor Credential
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: A Credential issued by a Governance Authority or an Auditor Accreditor asserting that an Auditor is authorized to perform Accreditation for a particular Governance Framework. See Appendix H.
